text:
Madagascar has billed Nigeria 170,000 Euros (78million naira) for the Oroki they sent us.

Madagascar is fully cashing out on the stupidity of all of us.

Nigeria has herbalists and herb therapists- why not invest this 78million on them and use our own herbs?

This is a disgrace.
